Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Chicago in 2016...
Injured on 4/1/2016 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/2016 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/27/2017 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 7/17/2017 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/26/2017 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/2018 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Philadelphia on 6/25/2018 (Going to PHI: P Gale Otterson, CF Danny Suarez. Going to CHI: C Carlos Villanueva, P Shayne Funk)...
Injured on 8/30/2018 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2019, off Fernando Cantu (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2019, off Frank Ashley (DET)...
Injured on 4/16/2019 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/4/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2019, hitting .323 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis (C) on 8/22/2019...
Injured on 6/25/2020 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 8/6/2020 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/6/2021 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $985,714 through salary arbitration...
